H0.text: Wool coat is the material that best conducts electricity.

H2.text: Plastic straw is the material that best conducts electricity.

H3.text: Wooden stick is the material that best conducts electricity.

A4.text: Copper's superior electrical conductivity enhances the efficiency of electrical motors.

A5.text: Copper remains the preferred electrical conductor in nearly all categories of electrical wiring except overhead electric power transmission where aluminium is often preferred.
